article_title: Professor at center of controversy to speak at Wheaton College
article_text:

og.description: NORTON - A former professor from Wheaton College in Illinois who stirred religious and political passions by siding with Muslims - and inadvertently sparked a case of mistaken identity involving two colleges - will visit Wheaton College in Norton next month to talk on what it means to support others.
og.title: Professor at center of controversy to speak at Wheaton College
